data.name: Scared Tube
data.detailed_description:
Welcome, Horror Tube Influencer in a world where you try to gain your way to fame in a horror survival-type investigation world. Travel to different haunted locations by yourself or collaborate with up to four other scared tubers as you search for ghosts. Use items to determine what type of ghost you are dealing with, and always remember these ghosts are not friendly.

Scared Tube uses your trusty cell phone and other gear, a checklist, and a camera. Design your character because who doesn’t like custom characters? But don't forget to buy some gear from the store, especially caffeine pills, because the witching hours when ghost are most active requires players to stay wide awake or die in a trance.

• The game uses different types of environments and more to come
• All gear is needed because you will never know what kind of ghost you are dealing with.
• Each ghost type uses a different hunting pattern, so be worn, or maybe lose control and watch as you attack your friends.
• Like any Influencer, your subscribers dictate your earning power, and if you die, you lose with a self-correcting system.
• Also, Influencers, you are responsible for your own gear because who gets free gear without sponsorship

data.short_description: Scared Tube is an indie, Early-Access horror-style game. You play as an influencer that explores abandon haunted locations. Like any horror influencer, you need to determine what kind of ghost you are dealing with for your audience. Get them like and subscriptions up, for currency and gear.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Dutch, Polish, Turkish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 375
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2060 / AMD Radeon RX 5700
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This is a horror survival and exploration game, Ghost and other items such as witchcraft symbols, some locations may have blood, and ghosts will hunt and cause violence by attacking the player, so in-game death, jump scares
